hadiths.text: Abu Qatadah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "When one of you comes to the Masjid, then let him perform two Rak'ah before sitting

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ إِذَا دَخَلَ أَحَدُكُمُ الْمَسْجِدَ فَلْيَرْكَعْ رَكْعَتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'When One Of You Enters The Masjid Let Him Perform Two Rak'ah'
